resources.string: Note: Disable App List mode in EdXposed Manager to use this module. Modified values take effect after a reboot.
Note: Only Android 11 Sony Xperia 5 II stock ROM is supported. Runs only on latest LSPosed.
Set as -2 to use original icon\'s width
Set as -2 to use original icon\'s height
Setting this to -1 means using system default value.
Unable to set: You must input a value in range.
Warning: customizing Nav Bar layout string can be very dangerous. Make sure you understand what the string means and there is nothing wrong before modification!
Empty (or string with only whitespace characters) means no modification
Double tap on Always On Display (Ambient Display) to wake
Reverse Own Order of \"All Apps\" in Launcher
Note: if you enabled \"Reverse Own Order of \'All Apps\' in Launcher\", do not adjust order of the apps !
